title: Attaching Units
contents: To attach units to a Commander, select the unit(s), then left-click the Commander you want to attach them to. A symbol will appear next to the assigned unit(s) to signify the attachment.
Commanders have a limit to the amount of units they can control, which is affected by their rank. Promotions are earned by the Commander reaching a dedicated amount of experience points.
After each promotion, the Commander is able to control 2 more units.
